item.title: RTX
item.description: score:10 Chances: RTX secured a $277 million contract for Excalibur 155 mm projectiles, indicating potential growth opportunities. The company is attracting institutional investors, with 81% ownership among them, which could signal investor confidence. RTX is involved in the development of advanced technology solutions for the aerospace and defense sector, a growing industry.
